name: extendscript-ponyfills
description: Modern JavaScript ponyfills for ES6. Intended for use with Extendscript.

scripts.build: spack && npm run types && npm run docs && npm run readme
scripts.release: npm run build && gh release create $npm_package_version $npm_package_main
scripts.types: rm -rf dist/types/* && npx -p typescript tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir dist/types

author: Martin Lindberg
